Package controllers

package controllers
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    NotificationController
    Controller responsible for sending notifications to customers.
    ReportController
    Controller responsible for generating and retrieving restaurant reports.
    ReservationController
    Business logic controller for all reservation-related operations.
    RestaurantManagementController
    Controller responsible for managing restaurant configuration settings.
    UserAccountController
    Controller responsible for user account management operations.
